title: Aspect-Based Sentiment Analysis
description: Developed an NLP-based system to analyze customer reviews at the aspect level. Implemented advanced sentiment classification techniques with feature engineering, dimensionality reduction, and fine-tuned models for performance optimization.

title: Medical MRI Brain Scan Segmentation
description: Designed a deep learning pipeline to segment six distinct brain layers from MRI scans. Utilized a U-Net architecture and hybrid methods integrating active contours, multi-threshold segmentation, and deep learning models for enhanced diagnostic accuracy.

title: Driver Fatigue Detection System
description: Built a real-time drowsiness detection system using computer vision and CNNs. Integrated eye aspect ratio (EAR) tracking, blink duration monitoring, and adaptive multi-level alerts to improve driver safety.

title: Movie Recommendation Engine
description: Implemented a PinSage-inspired recommendation engine using Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs) for personalized movie suggestions.

title: Gator Ticket Master
description: A ticket reservation platform for Gator Events that allows users to book and manage event seats efficiently with backend service support.

title: ACIS-iChatBio
description: Agent-based script built with OpenAIâ€™s Instructor framework to fetch, validate, and structure biodiversity occurrence data from the Atlas of Living Australia (ALA).

title: AskPY
description: An intelligent assistant that answers Python-related queries using a dual-source retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) pipeline, integrating internal documentation search with web-based resources.
